item.title: Report E-2024080138
item.description:
Report E-2024080138

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-12T15:14:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-10
  • City: SAINT LOUIS
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that due to a forklift incident, approximately 1-gallon of Motion Enzymatic Booster(hazardous - UN3082) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the trailer floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning the release donning the proper PPE per SDS.
